direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods perform a deep copy of the object, maintaining the internal state and structure.
Both methods involve cloning but differ in the depth of the copy, providing different test scenarios.
Both methods modify the internal state of the object, which can be tested for consistency after cloning.

enhanced_by.reason: Setting data before cloning ensures the state is consistent for testing.
Cloning the Document object before or after the DataNode clone can help verify the integrity of the cloning process.
Comparing the data of the original and cloned DataNode can verify the correctness of the clone operation.
